ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Neriad Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops...listed the wrong illusion, sorry, it s Water Elemental *bonks self repeatedly* ... wow, cool item if it does...  Could maybe be handy in Air plane 8)
ygData.messageBody:
Oops...listed the wrong illusion, sorry, it's Water Elemental *bonks self repeatedly*

>>> Cyr, Thierry<thierry.cyr@...> 01/19/01 09:34AM >>>
wow, cool item if it does... Could maybe be handy in Air plane 8)

-----Original Message-----
From: Khelan [mailto:khelan@...]
Sent: January 19, 2001 9:01 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Neriad Shawl


If any of you all hunt in Siren's Grotto, can you tell me if this item is
real?

http://www.eqmaps.com/zone.php3?tag=sirens&item=3674

Neriad Shawl
AC2, -10 str, 5 dex, -8sta, 10int, 25cha, 5 CR
Effect: illusion air elemental
Class: BRD, ENC

If so, it's another Illusion item for us.


--Khelan, speeding around Velious
